segments.text: You have an unusual accent , Mr . Robbins . Where are you from originally ? If you don ’ t mind me asking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . I was born in Madrid , but I came to the States when I was a teenager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that must be what I ’ m hearing , I really couldn ’ t place it . Do go back to Madrid often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t been back for more than ten years .
segments.speaker: S2
